https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4h7h3fmsTxybdUKU3PECkLDgmfI.jpg Korean War, 1951 Little Manuk is playing on the streets of his village and dreaming of life at the front where his father is a soldier. He returns home to find a parcel on the doorstep and, thinking it is a birthday present, he opens it. But its contents will change his life. Birthday Boy
